name: Room with big terrace & private bath
description: Central and quiet 15m2 room (Not Apartment!) with en suite bathroom and sunroof terrace with sun all day. 160x200 cm queen size bed, tables, chairs,  32" HD TV & BluRay player.  Self service breakfeast included. The 15 m2 room is light and quiet and the sun shines all day long on the private sunroof terrace. The room is facing the backyard so no street noise. Tables, chairs, en suite bathroom with shower. Selfservice breakfast (coffee, tea, bread, toast, juice, mysli, yoghurt ,cheese, cold cuts).  32"HD-TV, DVD/BluRay player, a selection of international movies on DVD and BluRay, Radio and WLAN internet included.    5th floor WITHOUT elevator!  The owner of the apartment is a famous Danish musician and You´ll find a lot of posters, awards and golden/platinum records all around. Access to kitchen and dining room, washing machine and dryer, hairdryer, iron and ironing board and extra towels. Bedlinen and towels are provided. We will be happy to help You with information about tourist att
house_rules: Smoking only on sunroof terrace. As we are under very strict Copyright laws in Germany we are held responsible for your Internet usage. By booking this guest room You confirm that whilst using the Internet connection You will not use any filesharing sites, programs or software (such as Megaupload, Rapidshare, Torrenz, 4share and others), and will not down- or uppload any music, movies or any other commercial or artistic content that is protected by the German Copyright Laws. You will be hold responsible for any violation of German Copyright Laws.

name: Spacious room in vibrant F-hain
description: High ceilings, wooden floors, white walls, and lots of light through the big windows are just some of the things that make this room special. The room has brand new furniture including a desk, chair, bookshelf, a big wardrobe, nightstand and a 160cm wide Queen size bed.  The apartment is located in Friedrichshain, close to Frankfurter Tor, in one of the best café/restaurant/club districts in Berlin. The room is quite big and has space for all your bags and stuff that you bring. The wardrobe can easily fit the clothes for 2 people and you have a desk and chair if you want to get some work done. The apartment is situated in the very heart of Friedrichshain, with just a minute's walk to restaurants, pubs, clubs and cosy cafés. You will be able to access your room, the shared kitchen and shared bathroom. Whenever I'm at home I'm glad to give tips on where to find the best restaurants, museums, clubs and other nice places to hang out. In the neighborhood you have the world's most famous nig
house_rules: I normally sleep after midnight since I get up for work at around 6:30, so it would be good if there is not too much noise after midnight :) No smoking or pets in the apartment, please. If you have any questions at all, send me a message and I'm sure we can work something out!

name: Central & sunny apartment balkony
description: 1 big room 2 minuts away from Leopoldplatz (U9,(URL HIDDEN) big, cheerful room with sunny balcony and view to Nazarethkirche. The apartment has one bathroom and kitchen. We love cooking, so our kitchen is well equipped with utensils and cooking dishes. You also find washing mashine, dishwasher and microwave. Up to 4 people can sleep in the apartment. There is one loft bed (1,40 -2,00m) and one sleeping couch 1,50-2,00m). Bed linen and towels are included. Normaly this is a two bedroom apt, we closed a small room because of our private things. So you can use 55m² of the 70m² apt included bathroom and kitchen. Free highspeed Wifi is also included. You can contact us at everytime. you have the apt for your own. During your entire stay, we will be contactable by mobile phone, email and Airbnb. This Area of Wedding is becomming a nicer neighboorhood every day. New beautyfull coffees and little restaurants open up like flowers. Also a lot of artists settled down.   Within 10 minutes you can
house_rules: We don't smoke and would prefer if our guests didn't smoke inside the apartment. Of cause you can use the balcony.The unlimited, high speed wireless internet is provided free of charge, but we ask that you don't illegally download any movies, please! The German authorities are quite strict about that. And like everywhere in Germany, they are also quite strict about the no loud noise after 10pm rule

name: Großzügiges Altbauzimmer mit asiatischem Flair
description: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe der Crellestraße. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen der zentralen Lage, der Umgebung und der netten Nachbarschaft. Meine Unterkunft eignet sich für Paare, Alleinreisende Abenteurer und Geschäftsreisende.

name: Gemütliche 1 Zimmer Wohnung
description: Die Wohnung liegt in einer ruhigen Lage in Tempelhof-Schöneberg Parkplätze sind vor der Tür. Die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel sind zu Fuß in 3-6 Minuten erreichbar. Es steht Ihnen auch eine Mikrowelle, Kühlschrank, Herd, Teller sowie Besteck zu Verfügung. Einkaufsmöglichkeit sind in der nähe zu Fuß 5min Sehr schöne und ruhige Lage sehr nah an der Platz der Luftbrücke und vielen. Bett Maße sind 120x200 cm. W Lan, TV Ich wohne nebenan wenn was sein sollte einfach klingeln oder anrufen bin immer erreichbar Die Freundlichkeit Bus, U- Bahn, S-Bahn sind alle zu Fuß erreichbar Die größe des Bettes ist 120x200 m
house_rules: Ich bitte Sie ab 20 uhr nicht zu viel Lärm zu machen da die Str ab 20 uhr wirklich ruhig ist

name: Kreuzberg, Spacious, Quiet, Terrace
description: Welcome to our classic Altbau Wohnung right between Görly, Schliesy, Kotti & the Spree (Right near everything you MUST see) The Apartment is completely renovated & has everything you will need to make your stay in Berlin an unforgetable experience. The Apt has high ceilings and polished floorboards throughout and a new Kitchen and bathroom.  We love the Apartment and the surrouding area and are sure you will too.  We have everything you may need during your stay from towels to kitchenware to tabletennis bats!!! We also have maps and info on Berlin you are welcome to borrow for your stay. Inclusions; Private Bedroom Queen Bed ( One fold out sofa Bed 140cm x 200cm and One Matress 160cm x 200cm which can be placed on floor Wireless Internet New kitchen including all extras you may need New Bathroom with towells/soap/shampoo/hairdryer Dishwasher Lots of Sun Roller Blinds Washing machine  Lounge and dining table 2 Extra Bikes for you to use We only rent the Apartment while we are away but w
house_rules: Just respect the other people living in the Apartment block.

name: Zimmer im Prenzlauer Berg
description: In meiner Wohnung gebe ich ein kleines Zimmer für Gäste frei.  Bad, Dusche, Handtücher. Meine Wohnung liegt im Helmholtzkiez, nahe den U+S-Bahnhaltestellen: "Schönhauser Allee" und "Eberswalder Str". einfach, klein, fein - aber kein Schreibtisch! small and fine! Wlan, Flur, Bad, Fön - aber keine Küche! All you need,  but there is no entrance to kitchen! ... wenn Zeit und gewünscht sehr gern - aber kein Anspruch auf gemeinsame Zeit! I like to meet and talk with you!  - but there is no must Der Prenzlauer Berg ist jung, hip, zentral, nicht wirlich ein Party-Kiez, aber nette Cafes und Parks.  Gute Anbindung an Partyzone "Friedrichshain" und Kunstzone "Mitte" Nice to relaxing. Nice cafe's and bars, but not so much trouble like a party-one! Very central for public traffic. ja, absolut. Die S- und U-Bahn- Haltestelle "Schönhauser Alle", die Ringbahn "Prenzlauer Allee" und die U- und Tram-Haltestelle "Eberswalder Straße" sind in ca. 5 Minuten zu erreichen. Parkplätze sind rar und kostenpflich

name: Chillout-WG 2015 Vol 2
description: Gemütliches Zimmer in schöner großer 4-Zimmerwohnung Unsere Vier Zimmer Wohnung liegt im Erdgeschoß und hat eine kleine Terrasse zum Innenhof mit etwas Grünfläche. In der Mitte befindet sich eine geräumige Wohnküche mit einem zum Esstisch umfunktionierten Billardtisch.  Dein Zimmer befindet sich zur Strassenseite hin und hat einen fest installierten elektr. Rolladen. Das Haus ist recht modern und gut gegen Lärm isoliert. Wir haben zwei Bäder, eines mit Dusche und das andere mit einer Badewanne. Beide stehen zur Nutzung zur Verfügung. Außerdem stehen eine Spül- und Waschmaschine sowie ein Wäschetrockner zur Verfügung. Bettlaken und Bettwäsche sind vorhanden. Handtücher können wir ebenfalls auf Wunsch zur Verfügung stellen. Unsere Gäste sind herzlich eingeladen neben ihrem Zimmer auch unsere Küche und Bäder sowie die Terasse zu nutzen. Außerdem darf unsere Tiefgaragenstellplatz gerne genutzt werden. Hier sind wir nicht festgelegt und halten das völlig spontan. Wenn es Zeit und Situation
house_rules: Hier haben wir sehr klare Vorstellungen: - wir bitten Euch nur draußen auf der Terasse zu rauchen - Wir nehmen maximal zwei Personen auf - Selbsterklärend sind die Privaträume der Bewohner tabu - Die Küche ist nach Nutzung wieder aufzuräumen/sauber zu machen - keine Drogen ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ - we kindly ask you to smoke only outside on our terrace - we accept two person at max - the kitchen should be kept clean - no drugs - seriously

name: 21apart Top Luxury Space incl. BRKF
description: NEW: REFINERY BERLIN BREAKFAST INCL.  COFFEE/TEE/JUICE + CROISSANT  21apart is in one of the best location in Berlin, 50 m from the beautiful Spree river and in front of the new Bertolt Brecht square with the Berliner Ensemble theater. NEW: REFINERY BERLIN BREAKFAST INCL. COFFEE/TEE/JUICE + CROISSANT except on Sunday 21apart gives you the opportunity to experience and enjoy our passion for design -  hand selected design pieces, contemporary and vintage furniture, berber rugs and special accessories create an atmosphere of design and lifestyle that will make your stay in Berlin unforgettable. The apartment offers: 2 comfortable boxspring beds, by request 2 movable hotel beds can be available, a living room with a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a bathtub and a separate rainshower. Every room at 21apart is well furnished with design classics and contemporary design pieces to make your stay comfortable. We offer:IPAD free Wifi, LCD TV, towels, showergel, shampoo,
house_rules: Please note that smoking, pets and parties are strictly forbidden inside the apartment. Please have respect for our neighbours and note that between 22:00 - 06:00 noises should be kept to a minimum. Illegal downloads and other illegal activities through the WIFI are strictly forbidden.

name: Design loft with rooftop & pool
description: Modern, scandinavian furnished design studio with huge window wall with view over Linienstraße. Located right in the boutique district (best area of Mitte) with plenty to do just outside the door. Access to amazing shared rooftop garden with swimming pool. The lift will take you to the apartment in the new concrete building with panorama windows and here you will enter a small but amazing apartment located in the best area in Mitte. The area is safe and quite but offers a lot of cosy cafés, restaurants and bars just a few steps outside the door. The exclusively furnished apartment of 35 sqm offers more then just high comfort, you will find interesting art, cool details and also some designer classics. Lot's of visible concrete and the black floor adds a lot of character to the loft. The wardrobe in the hallway gives you a lot of space for your clothes and there you'll also find hangers, iron, washing powder, simply everything you need to take good care of you clothes during your stay.
house_rules: PLEASE NOTE! Do not leave the key in the lock on the inside of the door. If you leave it in the lock it's not possible to open the door from the outside. Please do not wear shoes inside. Thanks

name: Fontane Studio | Kreuzberg Südstern
description: Small and pretty studio (20m2) in a traditional Berlin building with wooden floors, stucco, and original details. This particular flat used to serve as the living space for the concierge. Small and pretty studio (20m2) in a traditional Berlin building with wooden floors, stucco, and original details. This particular flat used to serve as the living space for the concierge. The flat includes a comfortable daybed that folds out to be full-sized, a small kitchen, a cozy dining table and a bathroom with shower. A huge window looks out onto the back garden and a school yard. The studio is a total of about 20 square meters, with a separate bathroom and hallway of its own, and is totally self-sufficient. Access in the Studio is therefore not restricted. Our family also resides in the building and can be reached by phone if you have questions. The house is only 200m from Südstern and Körtestraße in one of the most beautiful, and surprisingly quiet streets in bustling, hip Kreuzberg. This studi
house_rules: The studio is in a building with families with children. Therefore, please no parties or loud music. A good night's sleep is important for those who live here. Please treat the apartment with care, let me know if something is broken or needs to be replaced and, upon your departure, leave things as you found them. Smoking is not permitted in both the home and for the entrance and front of the house. If you lose the key, I regret that we will have to charge the full deposit ( EUR 100) , as the key is very expensive and special, and opens both the front door and apartment door. And of course no illegal streaming of TV , movies, music etc ...

name: STUDIO FAMILY FLAT PRENZLAUER BERG
description: STUDIO FLAT IN PRENZLAUERBERG - EINE OASE FÜR FAMILIEN-little apartment for family-klein aber fein (45 m2): Nagel neu,frisch saniert und neu eingerichtet:Familienfreundlich gemütlich und sauber! Nur 5 Minuten von S Bahn entfernt ( S Prenzlauer Alle)! Die Wohnung befindet sich im  Herzen  Prenzlauer Bergs, dem schönsten Viertel der Stadt.  Diese neu, komplett sanierte & renovierte Studio Wohnung befindet sich in einem Eckhaus  im Erdgeschoss. Die Fenster sind mit Elektrorolläden ausgestattet.  Das Studio-Apartement ( ca. 45 m2) verfügt über ein gemütliches Wohn-/Schlafzimmer mit einem bequemen 1,40 breitem Boxspringbett, einem Doppelstockbett - liebevoll auf Maaß gebaut von unserem Profi Tischler - richtige Highlight nicht nur für unsere kleinen Gäste, sowohl  auch für alle Erwachsenen. Eine  gemütliche Wohnecke mit Ledercouch sowie ein  kleiner  TV Bereich sorgen fürs Wohlbefinden  und für die  Entspannung. Die moderne und neue komplett eingerichtete Küche ist mit einem   Kaffeevollaut
house_rules: - Dies ist eine Nichtraucherwohnung. Rauchen nur draußen erlaubt  (auch im Hinterhof: dafür benutzen Sie bitte einen Aschenbecher.  - Check in - 15.00-20.00 Uhr  - Check out - 10.00 Uhr - Check in von 20.00 bis 23.00 - gegen Aufpreis  - 50.00 Euro  (Zahlung in bar bei der Ankunft). - CITY TAX (Übernachtungssteuer : 5 % des Netto Übernachtung  Preis + MwSt) .Diese Steuer ist nicht im Preis inbegriffen, sie muss   direkt in der Wohnung bei Ankunft  in bar bezahlt werden.  Die Höhe der Steuer wird individuell per Mail zugesandt.  - Partys oder Veranstaltungen  in der Wohnung sind nicht gestattet! - Keine Tiere erwünscht! - Reinigung (einmalig) - 85 Euro - Zahlung bei der Ankunft in Bar. Standard - Fest Preis = 75 euro  pro Nacht für 2 Personen; jeder weitere Person- 30 Euro  zusätzlich pro Übernachtung.

name: Family House
description: das vier - Zimmer Appartement mit voll ausgestatteter Küche, 3 Schlafzimmern und einem Wohn-Essbereich, Masterbad und Gäste WC, liegt im Vorderhaus.  Das Haus ist ein sanierter Altbau und die Ferienwohnung liegt im Souterrain. Die Ferienwohnung liegt in einem schönen Altbau- komp. saniert im Souterrain , 4 Zimmer ca. 120m², Küche mit Einbauküche, gr. Duschbad mit 2 Duschen, Gäste-WC ( 1 Wohnzimmer, 3 Schlafzimmer, Küche mit EBK, großes Duschbad) Ferienappartement liegt im Bergmannkiez mitten im Kreuzberger Getümmel, viel Restaurants, Kaffeebars, Sehenswürdigkeiten, Feste, Partys alles was ein Herz begehrt. ich, mein Mann und meine Tochter Elisa sind immer zu erreichen. Sie können uns mit dem Auto wie folgt erreichen. BAB 100 Ausfahrt Tempelhofer Damm, nördliche Richtung Stadteinwärts, Tempelhofer Damm folgend, gerade aus vorbei am Platz der Luftbrücke, übergehend in den Mehringdamm dritte rechts in die Bergmannstraße, erste links in die Nostitzstr.15.  Sie könne uns aber auch mit der U
house_rules: keine Partys und Feiern, es darf nicht in den Räumlichkeiten geraucht werden, keine Tiere,

name: Lux Berlin 1: boutique & design
description: "Lux Berlin 1" is a stylish boutique apartment on the ever-popular Oderberger Strasse in the trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg, bordering on Mitte. The apartment is fully equipped for long stays; please contact me for special monthly rates. LUX BERLIN 1 is on the 4th floor of a restored turn-of-the-century building and has a balcony with a superb view over the entire Oderberger Strasse. You can watch the people stroll up and down the Kastanienallee while having coffee in the morning or the sun set over the Mauerpark while sipping a glass of wine in the evening. The apartment has been completely remodelled and renovated while maintaining original features like arched windows and beautiful hardwood floors and is decorated with an eclectic mix of contemporary design furniture and vintage pieces from the 60's & 70's. "Lux Berlin 1" combines old-Berlin charm with modern-day comfort and offers an exclusive living environment in one of the prettiest, most vibrant neighbourhoods of Berlin.  L
house_rules: *Smoking allowed only on the balcony! *No illegal downloading! *City tax: 5% of the rental price  (not included in the rental price, due upon arrival)  *Late check-in fee (check-in after 19:00 & on public holidays): 20 EUR *Guests with small children: please ask before booking! *For monthly bookings only: additional cleaning fee: 35 EUR

name: Beautiful bright flat - central
description: This beautiful rustic flat lays right in the middle of Charlottenburg and is surrounded by coffee-shops, parks and sightseeing Highlights (for example "Schloss Charlottenburg). It is also perfectly connected to rest of the city.  The apartment is in the top (5.) floor of a historically protected apartment house from 1893. Everything is really cosy and mostly made of wood. Great cealing windows guarantee a lot of light.   There is a big bed in the galery (190 x 150 cm) and a sleeping couch can be extended to 200 x 170 cm. The big balcony is directed to the south. Broadband - Internet (with Wireless Lan) is free of charge and you will also find a big TV Set. The pentry-kitchen contains all necessary items (and you can always ask me for anything that is missing). Please note: There is no elevator. The entire place is extremely cosy and makes you want to stay there :-) The apartment is located in the heart of Charlottenburg a historic and very animated district with many cafes, bars, resta
house_rules: No Parties

name: Wohnung in Berlin zentrum,Schloss Strasse!
description: Sehr saubere und komfortable Wohnung in Berlin zentrum.Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen Gemütlichkeit, Küche und Licht. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für paare und geschäftsreisende. Die Bushaltestelle ist direkt vor der Haustür. Das Apartment besteht aus einem Wohnzimmer, Küche und Bad. Die stabile Couch im Wohnzimmer ist ausziehbar, so dass 4 Personen komfortabel übernachten können. Die Küche ist vollständig mit den wichtigsten Küchenutensilien ausgestattet (Kühlschrank mit Tiefkühlfach, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Toaster, Geschirr, Besteck, Töpfe etc.). Das Duschbad mit Dusche und großem Waschbecken ist sehr sauber. Eine Waschmaschine ist auch vorhanden.  Die Internetverbindung ist sehr schnell. Die Wohnung verfügt außerdem über einen kleinen Balkon mit Blick ins Grüne. Parkplätze sind direkt vor der Haustür in der kleinen Straße genug zur Verfügung. Bis zum nächsten U9-Bahnhof sind es 8 min zu laufen (U-Walther-Schreiber-Platz) und S-Banhof sind es 6 min zu laufen(S-Bahnhof Feu
house_rules: Rauchen ,partys und haustiere streng verboten

name: Single room, perfect located!
description: Hello traveller:) Welcome to our shared flat in Neukölln. Your room will be not too big (12sm) but ,like our living room, headed to the inner yard, which creates a cosy atmosphere. You will appreciate it, cause on the other hand you step out of the door directly into the chaos. Berlin really never sleeps:) Its also possible to get an additional room in our flat. Feel free to ask me about that!

name: Gemütliches Gästezimmer in Berlin-Tempelhof
description: Das Gästezimmer ist ein Zimmer in unserer 100qm großen Wohnung. Sie liegt sehr zentral in der Nähe der U+S-Bahn-Station Tempelhof. Die Küche kann von unsere Gäste auch genutzt werden um sich selbst zu versorgen. Wir freuen uns auf Paare, Singles, Geschäftsreisende und alle, die Tiere gerne haben. Außerdem sprechen wir drei Sprachen: Deutsch, Englisch und Russisch. Das Gästezimmer ist ein Zimmer in unserer 100qm großen Wohnung. Sie liegt sehr zentral in der Nähe der U+S-Bahn-Station Tempelhof. Bis zur Stadtmitte sind es nur 10-15 Minuten. Die Wohnung liegt in der 6. Etage (mit Fahrstuhl). Von dort hat man einen schönen Ausblick über die Hauptstadt. Die Küche kann von unseren Gäste auch genutzt werden um sich selbst zu versorgen. Unser Wohnzimmer ist 30 qm groß. Von der gemütlichen Couch kann man über Beamer einen schönen Fernsehabend mit Kino-Atmosphäre genießen. Wir haben einen Kater, der sehr lieb ist und gerne neue Leute kennenlernt. Er hat aber seinen eigenen Schlafplatz... :-) Wir

name: Cozy Altbau Room With Balcony In Neukölln
description: My flat is near the famous roof-club Klunkerkranich and the Tempelhofer Feld. There are a lot of nice places around like Villa Neukölln, Lavanderia Vecchia, Kindl Stuben.  So if you wanna have a good time in Berlin and you like to discover the multi-cultural area of Neukölln with its new clubs and bars, you will love my place. Use my balcony for breakfast or the hammock to relax. For rainy days you have an TV and a lot of games and books. If you want you can use my old PlayStation 2. My flat is near the famous roof-club Klunkerkranich and the Tempelhofer Feld. There are a lot of nice bars and restaurants around like Villa Neukölln, Goldammer, Lavanderia Vecchia, Kindl Stuben.  So if you wanna have a good time in Berlin and you like to discover the multi-cultural area of Neukölln with its new clubs and bars, you will love my place.  With the two subway stations nearby it is very easy to visit the city and all sight-seeing hot-spots.  For rainy days you have an TV and a lot of games and
house_rules: - Rauchen könnt ihr gerne auf dem Balkon

name: artsy&cosy in authentic neighborhd
description: my sweet and cosy apartment is located in a classical berlin apartment block in the area of wedding, which is slowly becoming more hip, but still has an authentic feeling to it. public transportation is super close. mitte and the famous tv tower are only a few stations away. i tried to give a very personal touch to my place, so i feel home and comfortable when i'm in berlin. i hope it will feel the same for you. there's different styles and things from all over the world combined. it's quite a colorful mix, but still simple and honest. i will be there when you arrive to hand over the keys and give you a short introduction to my place and the area, feel free contacting me whenever you need help with something. i'm usually always available on my cellphone. This apartment is located at the 4th floor of a classical Berlin apartment block in the area of Wedding, which is slowly becoming more hip, but still has an authentic feeling to it. the next access to public transportation is only two
house_rules: no parties, no pets, and no smoking.

name: Art Creation // Ostkreuz
description: Bel etage / 1st floor  / Also exposing my work in progress, my place with 2 balcony became an cosy atelier. Live like a local in a 45sq flat:  Polished floorboards, fully furnished, nice private kitchen with all the necessary. "SCHICKE!" Building for a single or a couple Art pieces in progress. Good starting point to explore Berlin Bathroom with laundry // One big and light room + kitchen: 30m2 Privat Balcony // Privat Kitchen Tips where to eat, to go out in the kiez... Ask me to join me during my night tour, if you can! I'm from Paris and I speak French, English, German and Spanish This alternative part of Berlin is direct access to the Spree and Big Treptow Park. Good spot to discover Berlin. A lot of things who are not in your travel book: Clubs, bars and restaurants (buffet). Situated in a quiet street. 2 min from supermarket and Späti (small shop) around closed late. Free parking space. Few minutes from Treptower Park and the Spree. The main station Ostkreuz is close by and offers
house_rules: Open mind // Respect my lovely place No Download please!

name: Cozy Room in Best location of Kreuzberg
description: Herzlich Willkommen im Herzen Berlins Wir freuen uns Euch ein gemütliches und ruhiges Zimmer in einer großen Kreuzberger Altbauwohnung anzubieten. Das Zimmer hat ca. 13qm und ist ausgestattet mit zwei Doppelbetten. Die Wohnung befindet sich in Top-Lage(URL HIDDEN)Mehringdamm 5min Fußweg S Bahnhof & U Yorkstr 7min Fußweg  Bergmannkiez 7min Fußweg Potsdammer Platz 10min Fußweg Wir teilen gerne unsere geräumige Wohnküche mit Kühlschrank, Waschmaschine, Spülmaschine, Geschirr und einem Kickertisch :)

name: rooftop-apartement "Blueberry Hill"  Berlin center
description: We offer a modernstyle but practical apartement in a typical old B(URL HIDDEN) is very clean, sunny and calm, although it is in the mid of the city. You have perfect public traffic with subway,railway, busses and taxi. You are heartly welcome ! Nonsmoking apartement !! Smoking is not allowed. Only outside on the terrace. No parties allowed, due to the noise problem for the neighbourhood !! We will conduct a personal check-in and check-out. The checkin and checkout is obligatory. No self-checkin-out.  Standard checkin-time is 6 p.m. and checkout 10 a.m. Other times available on request. We try to be as flexible as possible. IMPORTANT ! You have to clean up the apartement before leaving. Redeliver the apartement in a fair condition, so we are able to clean it later perfectly in a reasonable time. The "Blueberry Hill" apartement is a very well equipped apartement in the center of Berlin. It is sunny, very calm, very clean and there is nothing you will miss.  Everything is of good quality.
house_rules: Smoking in the apartement is forbidden. You may smoke on the balcony outside. No parties allowed. checkin after 18:00 o´clock checkout before 10:00 o`clock Other delivery and redeliverytimes on request possible, but not obligatory. A personal, individual checkin and checkout is obligatory. As we deliver the apartement in a very clean status, we like to ask our guests to delivery it also in an acceptable cleaned condition.  We have a high valued equippment and furnitures. Pls take care. Many thanks.

name: 4 ROOMS & 110 SQM - DESIGN APARTMENT (I)
description: In the heart of Berlin you will find this modern furnished 4 room apartment (110sqm). Located in Berlin-Moabit which is a district of Berlin-Mitte, the city-west as well as the center of Berlin is easily accessible. The apartment can accommodate up to 11 people. It has 3 separate bedrooms. Sightseeing, nightlife, Tegel Airport and the main station are within easy reach. This 4 - room apartment is about 110sqm in size and can accommodate up to 11 people. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Free public parking is available directly in front of the door. On request, a parking space can be booked (10 Euro / day). The bright, spacious apartment (about 110 m²) has a spacious living room with a large flatscreen TV, a comfortable sleeping sofa, a large kitchen and a cozy dining area. The open kitchen is fully equipped and has a dishwasher. The bathroom has a bath, a shower and a washing machine. Furthermore, the apartment has 3 separate bedrooms. name: 20 sqm of Kreuzberg in a cozy appartment
description: Double room (1,60x2,00) in a cozy, quiet and stylish apartment. The flat is bright and has a nice view. Living room and the modern bath to share. You will stay directly in the heart of the popular district Kreuzberg famous for his multi-culti charme. Public transportation (Metro, Bus) is very close. You would just need a few minutes to go to the most famos places. Close to River Spree, Tempelhofer Feld, Alexander Platz and Jewish Museum. A lot of well known clubs, bars, pubs and fancy restaurant are around within walking distance. As well as nice possibilities to shop clothes or typical Berlin design stuff. The very famous hipster-district Neukölln is reachable by foot easily - not only for hipsters. Next metro stations:  U8 Schoenleinstraße (8 minutes) (direct connection to Alexanderplatz (10 min.) U1 Goerlitzer Bahnhof (8 minutes) (direct connection to City West/Schoeneberg (12 min.) and Friedrichshain (2 min.) Bus: M29 in front of the door (direct connection to Potsdamer Platz (15 m

name: Ganze Unterkunft – Bungalow
description: Wir bieten einen voll ausgestatteten Bungalow mit kleiner Terrasse an. Gelegen im Berliner Osten, in ruhiger und grüner Lage mit Parkplatz. Gute Öffentl. Verkehrs-Anbindung an das Berliner Zentrum und Berliner Umland - mit dem Bus in 15 Minuten zur Internationalen Gartenschau (IGA) ab 14.04.2017 ! Check-In: 14:00 Check-Out: 10:00 Der Bungalow ist sehr gut für 2 Personen geeignet.  Im Schlafzimmer  befindet sich ein großes Doppelbett mit den Maßen 200 x 180 cm,  2 Nachtschränke, 1 Kleiderschrank , 1 Tisch mit 2 Stühlen, großer Flachbildfernseher mit Satellitenempfang an der Wand , Radio und Festnetztelefon für Ortsgespräche. Das Bad hat eine Dusche, Waschtisch, Toilette, Bidet, elektrischen Handtuchtrockner, Spiegelschrank, Wandschrank und  Waschmaschine. Die komplette Unterkunft hat zusätzlich zur Zentralheizung noch Fußbodenheizung. Die Küche  ist vollständig ausgestattet mit Geschirrspüler, Mikrowelle,  Filterkaffeemaschine,  4-Platten Elektroherd,  Abzugshaube, Kühlschrank und Tiefk
house_rules: Im Bungalow besteht striktes  Rauchverbot, nur vor der Tür (mit Überdachung) darf geraucht werden.  Bitte keine weiteren Gäste oder Haustiere mitbringen. Beim Verlassen des Hauses bitte die Türen abschließen und die Fenster schließen.

name: Room for 4 in the heart of Berlin
description: Berlin Prenzlauerberg, very close to the metro U2
house_rules: It is a nonsmoking house, but as it is on first floor, outside is only a few steps away...

name: TOP MODERN; TERRACE, JACUZZI, WiFi
description: A beautiful, newly renovated apartment with a  rooftop terrace, whirlpool tub and modern interior, located within walking distance from metro lines.  What else can make your stay in Berlin perfect? (apartment available for mid or long term bookings). The apartment is newly renovated and has many luxury features. The modern bathroom is equipped with a spacious design-whirlpool for two and a towel dryer. You deserve a reward after a long day in the city!  You will have your private terrace with a sofa lounge (accessible from the dining-area). This is a perfect place to chill-out for a drink in the evening, or enjoying breakfast in the morning sun.  Our apartment has a trendy kitchen, with brand new appliances.The living room is divided into 2 parts, one part is dining area and other part is socializing area. We have installed a TV for your convenience (with German and some English channels). Our living-room is equipped with a corner sofa which can easily be converted to a comfortable sof
house_rules: As this is a residential building, we would like to kindly ask you to show respect towards our neighbours by not being too loud or playing loud music after 9 pm. Also, the whirlpool jet stream function must not be used after 9 pm. You will be asked to sign the German agreement about the usage of internet because of the local very strict anti-piracy laws.  Smoking is not allowed in the flat, feel free to use the terrace though.  If these rules are broken, it may be taken into consideration in the deposit.

name: Modernes Ferienhaus in Berlin
description: Modernes Ferienhaus mit schönem Garten in ruhiger Umgebung und zentraler Lage in Berlin Das Ferienhaus wurde 2012 saniert und modernisiert und befindet sich in einer ruhigen Einfamilienhausgegend. Über die gute Anbindung mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreicht man in 20 Minuten das Zentrum Berlins. Auf 33 Quadratmeter bietet das Appartement ein Doppelbett, eine offene Küche mit Essbereich sowie ein Bad mit ebenerdiger Dusche und Toilette. Vom Wohnbereich kommen Sie auf die Südterrasse mit Gartenmöbeln und Sonnenschirm. Für kühlere Sommertage ist eine Fußbodenheizung vorhanden. Das Ferienhaus wird von April bis Oktober vermietet. Zur Ferienwohnung gehört ein Carport auf dem Grundstück, hier stellen Sie bequem Ihr Auto ab.  Im Garten können Sie Liegestühle, Grill und Feuerschale nutzen. Berlin-Karlshorst ist ein schöner Ausgangspunkt zur Stadterkundung.  Die Sehenswürdigkeiten von Berlin sind sehr gut mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen.  Sie finden Einkaufsmöglichkei

name: 1 room in Neukölln / Weserstr.
description: 1 room with 160x200 bed in Weserstr (close to Elbestraße) with window towards a very quiet courtyard. Separate apartment with your guest room and my office. Bathroom and shower will only be used by you. Kitchen with fridge. Cooking is not possible. - fast WIFI - bathroom with shower and washing machine - kitchen with refrigerator Separate apartment with (your) guest room and an office. The office is not used very often. U7 subway M41 bus - directly to main train station (Berlin Hauptbahnhof)
house_rules: strictly non-smoking!!!

name: Beautiful Botanic Furnished Room at Neukölln
description: There are several bars and cafes just in the our Richardstr, like Sameheads bar, Botega 6, Café Botanico, and many more. 2 minutes from the subway station, line U7, and Karl Marx str, a big commercial center in Berlin. You will enjoy our accomodation for many reason, like the full equipped kitchen, for the beautiful garden in the back, and for us! Our accomodation is open for couples, lone travelers and working travelers. We are also animal friendly! We have a very nice, well located appartament in Rixdorf, an historic village in the center of Neukölln, Berlin. We live in 4 people: me and my girlfriend, our just-some-weeks-old son, and Jack, an Australian living with us. You will have a very comfortable room and as shared space, you can use the living room, the kitchen and obviously the bathroom. You can access the living room, the kitchen and the bathroom obviously =D Usually I will be working, but when free I'll gladly give some information over the city and surrounding. We are on to
house_rules: No Movie or music downloads, Germany will fine me for that!

name: ♥ Loveley,  cozy and calm room in Neukölln ♥
description: My Boyfriend and I living in the nice Schillerkiez and we have a room to share with you: a couple, a person travelling alone or on a business trip. We re pleased to show you our nice neighbourhood: we have to big parcs around (the former airport Tempelhof and Hasenheide), nice cafés & bars, little shops, restaurants, a nice market twice a week, everything you ll need is a stone's throw away. The metro is U8 (Boddinstraße). The apartment is situated on the 4th floor (no elevator). I like an apartment being cosy, comfortable and personal. You ll find some vintage and design furniture, some nice plants and some finds from the flea market. We have a balcony where you can enjoy your cigarette. Bathroom, kitchen, Living room. It all depends! We can have a coffee together, I can reccomend you restaurants, galeries, bars and so on. In case you wish total privacy, I'll obviously respect that, too. 5 minutes walk to the Metro Station (Boddinstrasse, U8).

name: A unique Oasis in Berlin
description: Located in the hip Kreuzkölln neighborhood, on the beautiful Landwehr canal. The famous Turkish food market and many bars & restaurants are just around.  Short distance from the main U-Bahn links (Hermannplatz and Kotttbusser Tor)  Easy and quick  from/to the airports This Unique Oasis in the heart of Berlin will provide you luxury facilities and comfort. Perfect for traveling couples or friends. This beautifully renovated 100qm duplex is divided into two levels, kitchen, living room and dining room are at the ground level and the bedrooms and bathroom are located on the upper-level. The apartment is located in the rear house which makes it very quiet. The kitchen is fully equipped (coffee machine, microwave, smoothie maker etc.) The spacious dining & living room are a real pleasure after a long day enjoying the city. If you are coming to Berlin with a car, you will be able to park close to the house for free. Also if you are interested in renting a bike, we will point you to the right

name: Big guest room in Kreuzberg
description: Bright and cozy 25 m2 room in Kreuzberg within famous Bergmannkiez, a lot of Bars & Restaurants near to the apartment - helles gemütliches 25m2 Gästezimmer in Kreuzberg im beliebten Bergmannkiez, mit vielen Bars & Restaurants in der Nähe Meine 3-Raum-Altbau-Wohnung befindet sich im beliebten Bergmannkiez in Kreuzberg. Ich biete ein großes Gästezimmer mit 140x200cm Bett, Leseecke, Kommode und Schreibtisch. Darüber hinaus könnt ihr gern das Wohnzimmer mit großer Couch, Fernseher & PlayStation, die Küche mit Herd, Kühlschrank, Spülmaschine und Sitzeecke und natürlich das Bad mit Badewanne nutzen. Ich wohne selbst auch in der Wohnung. Tagsüber bin ich arbeiten und abends auch gern für Unternehmungen zu haben. Ich lerne gern neue Leute kennen. Falls du/ihr also mögt, können wir gern zusammen frühstücken oder was trinken gehen. Falls nicht, ist das natürlich auch völlig ok. :)  My 3 room flat in a building from wilhelminian time. It's located in famous Bergmannkiez in Kreuzberg with a lot of

name: Lift& free breakfast-Room in the heart of Kreuzbeg
description: Stay with us and our newborn baby in the heart of Berlin and experience the real Kreuzberg. It is one of Berlin's most interesting and fascinating districts. You'll experience urban buzz, vibrancy and diversity here at every turn. The streets and buildings have retained their very special atmosphere.  We won't charge extra fee if you travel with your baby. The flat is on the 4th floor (Don't worry, we have an elevator :-D)  Your rented room will provide you with a cosy bed, wardrobe with coathangers, desk + chairs, bed table. The apartment is facing a quiet green courtyard, away from the main street. You will have access to 1 private bedroom, a private toilet for your own use and a shared shower with us. Your are also welcome to use our kitchen including kitchen tools and the fridge. In the spacious living room you are welcome to use the TV. Also the diaper changing table if you travel with your baby :) Being passionate travelers we are open and interested in meeting new people, gettin
house_rules: - It is possible to check in earlier than our check in time, but the cleaning lady is a student and she can only come at 16:00. Also possible to arrive later if you don't mind self check-in. - Smoking allowed only on the balcony - VERY IMPORTANT: German law is super strict regarding copyright. You will be asked to sign an agreement not to use the internet for illegal activities, for example file sharing platforms (both upload and download) of copyright content. You are responsible for your own internet activities and liable for any damaged fee (up to 1000Euro)  from your action.

name: One minute walk from Kollwitzplatz
description: Quiet and comfortable flat in Prenzlauer Berg on fourth floor (unfortunately no lift), the tram stop is about 2 minutes away (M2) and takes about 5 minutes to Alexanderplatz (interchange for trains and tubes). From Alexanderplatz to Schönefeld airport 25 minutes by train, to Tegel Airport it takes about 30 minutes. Flat has no balcony but one french window a hairdryer is available
house_rules: As flat is in residential building guests would have to stick to the ordinary rules applying to such a building i.e.  keep noise down at night etc.

name: 4 floor house full equipped with garden + terrace
description: In this house you are having 4 bedrooms(6 beds) with 2,5 bathrooms + living kitchen + living room + terrace and garden, all for your own. Spread over 4 floors with ~ 200m² / 2150 Feet.  Feel free to use the bikes, barbecue, piano, table tennis, kitchen, terrace and much more things to discover. This house is located in the south-west of berlin (between Free University and city centre), close to Schloßstrasse (Steglitz), 2nd biggest shopping mile. This house has three floors(~150m²) + basement(~50m²) with 17 rooms in total + garden & terrace. Normally we rent single romms, but this accomodation means the full house, so there will be no hosts in the house and you are having everything for your own. Use everything you find in the house: from barbecue over bikes to computer and piano, parlor games, playstation .... If you are more than 5 you are renting the basment too, which has a totally new kitchen (built in april ´17) If you have any questions, i am accessible on phone, nearly the whol

name: 2 ROOM  APT
description: next station Pankow you need: 12 min to Alexander Platz 15 min to Brandenburger Gate 18 min to Potsdamer Platz I'm offering 2 rooms in a 5 room apartment. You have your own bedroom and living room.  I live in this apartment with my mother . We have our own 3 rooms. My mother is  retired She speaks german, french and bulgarian. I'm an event manager .I speak german,french, english and bulgarian. In the apartment is a shared kitchen, bathroom and toilet. I'm always interested to make nice experiences with people from all over the world.  You're welcome

name: Central+cosy+spacious - what else?
description: BERLIN - eine Stadt die pulsiert, inspiriert und fasziniert. Unsere helle, gemütliche und sehr gut ausgestattete Wohnung bietet eine optimale Ausgangsposition die Stadt zu erkunden.  Zentral. Gepflegt. Gemütlich. Hochwertig ausgestattet. Willkommen! - English Version see below - Wir bieten eine helle, gemütliche und hochwertig ausgestattete Wohnung, in der sich bisher jeder wohl gefühlt hat. Die Wohnung befindet sich in einem Altbau von 1904, welcher Ende 2015 neu saniert wurde. Die Wohnung befindet sich in dritten Stock und bietet durch die großen Fenster und den Balkon viel Tageslicht. Viele Sitzgelegenheiten bieten Platz zum Entspannen, Unterhalten und zum Essen. Bei der Einrichtung der Wohnung haben wir großen Wert auf Stimmigkeit und einer aufkommenden Wohlfühlatmosphäre gelegt. Diese möchten wir unsere Gäste spüren lassen. Das Ganze wird von unserer Katze komplettiert (Achtung Allergiker!), die dich auch mal gerne im Zimmer besucht.  Herzlich willkommen! We offer you a bright and
house_rules: Das Rauchen innerhalb der Wohnung ist nicht gewünscht.  Keine Gäste von außerhalb erlaubt.  Schuhe müssen beim Eingang ausgezogen werden. Wir bitten zudem höflich die Tür (nur wenn Sie nicht in der Wohnung sind!) einen kleinen Spalt offen zu lassen, damit die Katze sich in der gesamten Wohnung bewegen kann. Bitte immer selbst aufräumen und saubermachen wenn ihr z. B. die Küche benutzt habt oder das Badezimmer in ein Meer verwandelt habt ;).  Smoking is not permitted. It is not allowed to bring strangers to the apartment. No shoes in the flat. When you are not at home we kindly ask you to leave the door of your room open (only a tiny tiny gap), that our cat can walk around in the entire flat. Please clean up after yourselves e.g. when using the kitchen.

name: ✮ TOP Apartment Potsdamer Platz ✮
description: My apartment is located in the heart of the capital right on the sightseeing highlight Potsdamer Platz at the famous Sony Center. From here is your Berlin trip certainly an unforgettable experience. And for a good start to an eventful day, the apartment could hardly be more central. See for yourself ... State of the Art, extremely modern Apartment in the heart of the Berlin city, almost directly located at the Potsdamer Platz, the most central place for sightseeing in Berlin. You will be staying in the famous Sony Centre, one of the most prominent buildings in Berlin. The luxury apartment is located on 10th floor and welcomes you with unique style, best view, design and a smooth atmosphere just for feeling relaxed once you´re in. Starting your day full of discoveries in Berlin could hardly begin more centrally  .............................................................................................. POSITION: Whether Reichstag, Brandenburger Tor, Museumsinsel, Berlin philharmonic,
house_rules: The apartment is available on arrival from 3pm clock and day of departure until 11am. If you arrive after 10pm we charge 25 EUR in cash. Please let us know your expected arrival and departure time and inform us in case of possible delays for key pick. If you lose the keys to the tenant is liable up to the amount of the replacement costs. In the interests of good neighborliness, we ask you that, of 10pm to 6am the night's sleep is respected.

name: Our Guestroom at Potsdamer Platz
description: Come live with us , three students in their mid tweenties, right in the heart of Berlin, Potsdamer Platz. We will show you hospitality and welcome you to our 5 room apartment. Check for Details if you are interested! :) The Guestroom will be comfortable for 2 People or a loving cozied up couple. 10m² space (The bed is Queensize, 140x200cm) If needed we can arrange an extra matress in the guestroom. Apart from our private rooms, nothing is off limits. You are free to use both our bathrooms and make yourself something to eat in our kitchen or chill on our couch/ balcony anytime you want. You`ll get access to our 100mbit/s high speed Internet connection. If you need to wash some clothes/ iron them, we got you covered. Towels will be provided. Usually, there's somebody at home to answer all of your questions and have a lengthy chat.  If the work allows it, we are oftentimes  available to show you around and go to a restaurant or just watch a movie on the comfy couch. If you have to work or
house_rules: We are very relaxed people, so if you have any suggestions or problems just tell us :) Pets are not allowed! Smoking is only allowed on the Balcony! File Sharing / Torrenting online is prohibited ( Annoying german Laws) Please leave the common areas clean after their use ( Kitchen, bathrooms,...)

name: Sunny central rooftop room in Fhain
description: Dear Traveler, feel like home and enjoy Berlin.  The flat is located in the Rigaerstraße in F.hain.

name: Top-Location (Hackescher Markt) & Top-Price !!!
description: Dear guests, welcome to my apartment in Berlin Mitte (centre). The location of my flat couldn’t be better: it is situated in one of the most favourite places of Berlin – on Hackescher Markt. The most beautiful and interesting sightseeing places like Berliner Dom, Museumsinsel, Alexanderplatz, Fernsehturm, Nikolaiviertel etc. could be reached by walk. Also you find many restaurants, cafés and bars near my apartment to make your stay perfect. Nevertheless it is not loud in the apartment. I am sure you will enjoy your stay in my apartment. The room ist well equipped and comfortable and the location and the neighborhood is fantastic! I am a friendly and open-minded person who will support you to have a nice stay in Berlin. I speak 5 languages, so I am sure that the communication ant interaction will be not a problem for us :) S-Bahn Hackescher Markt, S-Bahn Oranienburger Straße, U-Bahn Rosenthaler Platz, U-Bahn Weinmeisterstr., Trams, Busses Public transport: S-Bahn Hackescher Markt, S-Bah

name: Living in the hotspot in Berlin
description: Nice place with private bathroom. I offer a beautiful 16-square-meter room plus private bathroom with bath in a large 5-room old-apartment in Berlin-Mitte. Around the corner, there are many clubs and pubs as well as Berlin-typical shopping deals. And I am also really nice and helpful ... The location is perfectly connected to various tram, metro and suburban train lines. My apartment is beautifully renovated with parquet and plank flooring. WLAN's course. Guests may contact me via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or Threema or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). During your stay, I'll give you advice or recommendations any time.

name: In heart of Mitte/Prenzlauer Berg
description: Beste Location um Berlin seine Geschichte zu erkunden. Eine große Wohnung für große Erwartungen. 1 Schlafzimmer und ein großes Wohn-Esszimmer zum Zusammenkommen und den Tag gemütlich ausklingen zu lassen. Bei einem gemeinsamen Essen, in der neuen Küche selbst zubereitet oder einem Glas Wein. Die moderne Wohnung verfügt über eine komfortablen Aufzug. Die Merkmale der Wohnung sind Hell, geräumig und modern stillvoll im Bauhausstill eingerichtet. Der Standort könnte historischer kaum sein. Am ehemaligen Grenzstreifen, nah am Brandenburger Tor, Mauerpark, Mauermuseum, Alexanderplatz Hackeschen Markt  und dem Reichstagsgebäude. Meine Gäste dürfen alles sehr gerne benutzen. Herzlich willkommen bei Fragen stehe ich gerne zur Verfügung. die Nachbarschaft ist sehr ruhig und freundlich... Die Wohnung ist innerhalb von 10 Minute vom Hauptbahnhof mit der M10 Straßenbahn zu erreichen. Des weiteren ist sie durch die U2 und U8 gute an das städtische Verkehrsnetz angeschlossen.
house_rules: - Bitte die Schuhe ausziehen die Wohnung hat Fußbodenheizung.

name: Design-apartment in quiet area near city center
description: This apartment offers you everything during a premium trip in Berlin.  I love living here as it is highly fashionable from the inside and outside. - brand new apartment built in 2016 with design furniture (original 70s, 80s GDR and modern era elements) - crucial for a trip in Berlin :) - for two people the apartment is spacious (many spots to store your luggage and shopping bags) Conveniences for you - Free coffee/tea+snacks - TV, Netflix-Account, Cable-TV, 5.1 Surround-System - High-speed Wifi included - Fully equipped kitchen - as a guest you have full access to bedroom, living room with kitchen, bath and loggia - furthermore you have access to the whole apartment complex which is nice for some walks - as there is also some of my private stuff in the apartment, some cupboards are locked - I am pleased to show you around personally if I am in the city - in case I am not in the city some friends of mine are pleased to inform you - plus you can pick up the keys from a local shop nearby

name: Elegant Flat on trendy MITTE street
description: Spacious flat in the trendiest neighbourhood of Berlin. Lush beds & cozy living room. The neighbourhood offers cool restaurants, cafés & bars. Upscale + local Berlin brands & most of Berlin landmarks are just down the road. Experience living in the best spot of Berlin in a lush apartment complete with everything you would need for a comfortable stay. -The entire apartment consists of 2 bedrooms with super lush kingsize beds, a spacious and cosy living room with french style balcony, big toilet and bath and a fully equipped kitchen for some gourmet cooking. -WIFI -Big UHD Smart TV with Netflix for home entertainment. -Awesome neighbourhood guaranteed! :) All of apartment's amenities. The Neighbourhood The apartment is centrally located and yet cozy and quiet at night. The street itself and the adjacent streets are home to very cool restaurants, high-end Berlin local labels for fashion, handcrafts, art and design objects. -A mere 5 minutes walk to Hackescher Markt/Hackesher Hofe, a buzzi
house_rules: 1) I will request for a copy of your ID upon arrival. 2)No partying. 3)Kindly take great care not to lose the keys. Charge for missing keys is €150. 4)No downloading of illegal files/use of any torrents. In case you have any downloading client/bittorent client installed in your laptops, please turn them off before you connect to the internet at home. 5)Be considerate to our neighbours  6)Avoid noise from 10pm

name: Berlin Mitte
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). big renovated altbau innerhaus with sunny balkon the apartment and inner hof quite family resident complex M8 to U8 and S-Bahn
house_rules: - no super noise after 11pm. provide sleeper in the house - Self-Check-in

name: big, cozy room in Friedrichshain
description: Welcome to Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg, one of the newest, most creative and most exciting districts! It's set on either side of the River Spree, on the border between east and west to experience urban buzz, vibrancy and diversity here at every turn. big, comfortable room with a couch and a nice armchair to relax. double bed  is integrated in a nice looking wooden podium (see pics) with a desk on top. Shared areas are the bathroom and the kitchen. Before your visit i can answer your questions via email! Welcome to Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg, one of the newest, most creative and most exciting districts! It's set on either side of the River Spree, on the border between east and west to experience urban buzz, vibrancy and diversity here at every turn. The flat can easily be reached by Tram M10 (Station: "Strassmannstrasse") or by Train (S-Bahn) S41/S42/S9 (Station: "Landsberger Allee"). M10: is 1 min walk  S(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) min walk Please, NO downloads from the internet!
house_rules: „Handle so, dass du die Menschheit sowohl in deiner Person, als in der Person eines jeden anderen jederzeit zugleich als Zweck, niemals bloß als Mittel brauchst.“ (Kant)

name: Electro Ω Project
description: If you find an apartment with better reviews, I urge you to book it!!! 36m² in BLN-Tiergarten. 11 Min to Hauptbahnhof (Central Station), 13 Min to Kudamm, 26 Min to Alexanderplatz. 120"(3m!) Picture Home Cinema, Fast Wi-Fi, Bathtub, Washing Machine.. Located nicely, close to some city centers. In around 20 Minutes you would get by bus and walk easily to Hauptbahnhof, Brandenburg Gate, Ku'Damm (Kurfürstendamm), Wilmersdorfer Straße. Around 30 minutes to get to Alexanderplatz. Around the corner there are two bicylce rentings. Both ask for 10€/bike/day. Lots of nice food stores in a distance of about 200-350m. Turkish, Arabic, Vietnamese, Chinese, Indian, Italian, Spanish cuisine. Starts very cheap at 2€ for one kebab. Rewe, a good super market, is also around 200m away. Also 200m to the Spree which is a nice river. In the apartment you'll find a high definition projector whos picture has a diagonal of 3m (118"). HTPC with more than 200 high def movies and TV-Shows. Around 90% of them in
house_rules: 1. After the booking is complete I'll send you a link to a youtube video. The first 1:30 are ABSOLUTELY MANDATORY. The rest is not but I highly recommend watching it. 2. In Germany it is totally illegal to download copyrighted content. If you use torrent based downloads you will very probably be fined (not by me). 3. Smoking only in the kitchen. ATTENTION! The smoke detector in the kitchen is turned off by default. Thats due to the fact that guests smoking are much more likely than a house fire. If you need maximum security AND you are a non-smoker please turn it on yourself or let me know. When you enter the kitchen it's located on the top right corner. 4. No crazy party people. If entertainment system is in use or you talk loudly with one another the windows have to be closed. Otherwise the neighbours will lose their s**t. Same if you are unnecessarily loud while being in the inner yard. 5. When you leave do NOT leave the key in the key hole. Leave it on the table for example. NOT in

name: URBAN DESIGN APARTMENT (3 ROOMS & 85 SQM) II
description: In the heart of Berlin you will find this modern furnished 3 - room apartment (85sqm). Located in Berlin-Moabit which is a district of Berlin-Mitte, the city-west as well as the center of Berlin is easily accessible. The apartment can accommodate up to 10 people. It has 2 separate bedrooms. Sightseeing, nightlife, Tegel Airport and the main railway station are within easy reach. This 3 - room apartment is approximately 85sqm in size and accommodates up to 10 people. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Free public parking is available directly in front of the front door. On request, a parking space can be booked (10 Euro / day). The bright, spacious apartment (about 85 m²) has a spacious living room with a large flat screen TV, two comfortable sleeping couches as well as a large kitchen and a cozy dining area. The open plan kitchen is fully equipped and has a dishwasher. The modern bathroom has a rainshower shower and a washing machine. Furthermore, the apartment has 2 sepa

name: Quiet, cozy room in Friedrichshain
description: Quiet, cozy room in a lively street (faces inner courtyard). Near Berghain, Mercedes Benz Arena, East Side Gallery, Boxhagener Platz many bars, restaurants and shops. The room has a mattress on a tatami mat (1,4m x 2m), desk, wardrobe and chairs. Bathroom with Tub  Kitchen (no dishwasher) You will share the flat with Andres.I've been living in Berlin since 2009.  English, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Français Great connections thanks to Warschauer Str. Station (Sbahn, u1, tram). 1 stop away from the East Station (Ostbahnhof) 55mins to Tegel Airport 45mins to Schoenefeld Airport 25 mins to Main Station (Hauptbahnhof) 30 mins to Potsdamer Platz. There is no shower, only open tub, so guests are kindly asked to shower sitting down. If you make a reservation request please let me know the time your phone estimated time of arrival. Usually, I can only check you in after 5pm (on weekdays), but I cam be flexible.
house_rules: Smoking only in the kitchen, no shoes in the bedrooms and bathroom.  Heating should be turned off when leaving the apartment and dishes washed immediately after using. Kitchen: Use of the oven is not allowed, please do not fry. Please do not cook after 10pm. Washing machine and dryer: only one load for stays over 5 nights. Respect the quiet after 10pm. No illegal downloads and please separate waste.

name: Skyview Apartment im Sony Center
description: Im Herzen von Berlin  Im 10. OG des Berliner Sony Center liegt mein komplett neu renoviertes und mit neuen Design Möbel ausgestattete Apartment. Dieses wunderschöne 100m² Apartment bietet Ihnen "the modern way of life" in vollen Zügen.  Willkommen! Im Herzen von Berlin  Im 10. OG des Berliner Sony Center liegt mein komplett neu renoviertes und mit neuen Design Möbel ausgestattete Apartment. Diese wunderschöne 100m² Apartment bietet Euch "the modern way of life" in vollen Zügen.  Das Apartment verfügt über Schlafmöglichkeiten für bis zu 6 Personen. Die beiden Schlafzimmer sind je mit einem komfortablen, neuen 1,80m x 2,00m großen Boxspringbett ausgestattet und im Wohnbereich befindet sich eine ausziehbare Schlafcouch mit einer Liegefläche von 1,60m x 2,00m. Zudem verfügt das Apartment über eine kleine Essecke mit 6 Sitzplätzen. Die beiden Badezimmer, eines mit einer begehbaren Dusche, das andere mit Badewanne, bieten ausreichend Platz.  Die Designer Küche ist mit allen notwendigen Küche
house_rules: Hausregeln zum Apartment Das Rauchen ist im gesamten Apartment nicht gestattet. Bei einer Beschädigung jeglicher Art, bitten wir Sie um eine sofortige Mitteilung. Ab 22 Uhr bitten wir um normale Zimmerlautstärke, wir möchten weiterhin einen guten Draht zu unseren Nachbarn haben. :-) Fühlen Sie sich wie Zuhause, wir ermöglichen Ihnen einen sauberen und ordentlichen Start in Berlin. Company rules for the apartment Smoking is prohibited in the whole apartment. In case of any kind of damage in the apartment, please notify us immediatly. From 10 pm on please held the noise on low volume, so our neigbours won't be disturbed. Please leave the apartment in the same place that you found it. Apart from that feel at home, we wish you a good time in berlin.

name: quiet studio in hip area of Berlin
description: The quiet studio lies at one of the top spots of Berlin: Friedrichshain.  the s-bahn at ostkreuz is just 5min to walk away, it only takes 10min to walk to Frankfurter Allee. Clubs and bars are nearby, the famous Berlin wall is easy to reach. It's spacious, quiet and fully equiped. Please notice, that is only a 1-room apartment You will have access to WiFi of course. You may also use the TV, Stereo, PS3 and Apple TV. I also have Netflix, if you feel in the mood for some movies or series. Feel free to read a book! I will welcome you at my home and give you some tips what to see and visit. In advance you might tell me how the stay should be like and I arrange something for you :) If I am not in town, my neighbor is always reachable and will help you out with any problems. He speaks perfectly English, German and Polish as well. - plenty of bars & restaurants just around the corner - food market on saturday & flea market on sundays nearby (Boxhagener Platz) - club culture is very strong her
house_rules: take care of my home, as it would be yours :) Smoking allowed in the kitchen (with open window)

name: TownHouse GuestRoom
description: Das Gästezimmer hat ca. 20qm und einen direkten Zugang zum gemeinsam genutzten Badezimmer, welches ebenfalls etwa20qm hat. Das gesamte Haus hat ca. 170qm und eine schöne Dachterrasse zum Verweilen. The guest room has around 20sqm and a direct access to the shared master bathroom which has around 20sqm as well. The entire place has around 170sqm and a wonderfull roof top terrace. Outrageous TownHouse with rooftop terrace and lake view. Selfcatering Bei Fragen stehe ich je nach Erreichbarkeit zur Verfügung. Available for questions and requests. Ruhige und beschauliche Nachbarschaft.  Keine lauten Partys. Rauchen ist im Haus nicht gestattet. Hierfür steht eine Dachterrasse zur Verfügung. Calm and decent neighborhood. No loud parties. Smoking is prohibited in the house. Therefor is a rooftop terrace available. Eine Busstation der Linie 347 ist gleich am Haus in einminütiger Entfernung gelegen. Dieser bringt Sie in 5 Minuten zur Station Ostkreuz. Die S-Bahn Stationen Ostkreuz und Treptower

name: Large room in the heart of Berlin!
description: Our apartment is located in Schöneberg, where Marlene Dietrich grew up and Kennedy said "Ich bin ein Berliner!". It's on the 5th floor (with lift) and has a great view. Nearby are a lot of cafés, restaurants and shops. 3 minutes by walk to the metro. There are three rooms. We use two of them, you will sleep in the other room. We share the bathroom. Poyraz works also sometimes as a tourist guide. He can give you some usefull tips! Marlene Dietrich grew up here and Kennedy said "Ich bin ein Berliner!" There are a lot of cafés, restaurants and shops. The room will be ready after 2 or 3 pm. Please let us know your arrival time. If we are home you could leave your lugguages earlier here and visit the city while we prepare your room. Checkout time ist 11 am. Sometimes it is possible to leave the luggages in the apartment and take them later. Please ask us previously if it is possible.
house_rules: Please respect the other people staying in the apartment and our neighbors. Don't be noisy, especially after 10 pm. Don't occupy the bathroom for too much time. Use the things carefully. Keep the room clean. Please inform us immediately if you dirty or brake something. Don't bring other guests to your room.

name: Berlin - Rooms (with air conditioning) - Gay Area
description: A room in Berlin at the Schöneberger Kiez, Directly at the Nollendorfplatz - you will be thrilled - you are in the middle and you can still sleep. - about 15m2 room - 1-2 persons (bed 1,60x2,00) - with air conditioning - Refrigerator in the room - Cooking facilities for coffee and tea - Including Internet WLAN - TV (who needs that already?) - Smoking: directly in front of the apartment door (Laubengang) possible Shared bathroom Whether you're looking for the KaDeWe, the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church or maybe the gay area: Prinzknecht, Woof, New Action, Scheune, Tom's, Mutschmanns, Blond, Connection Club, Blue Boy Bar, Bull- and and and... Fetish shops: Gear, R & Co, Mister B, Boxers, Slingking, Military Store, Brunos, RubAddiction - and and and ... - all within a 5 min. ... and if it should go into the Lab / Berghain, KitCat, Quälgeist or or or :-) ... every few minutes the train (about 200m from the doorstep). Nollendorfplatz U(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) -Check In: 15:00 (bis 02:00 next da
house_rules: Hausregeln / House Rules: Es ist dem Gast untersagt weiteren Personen den Zugang zur Wohnung zu gewähren! (…keine "Freunde" mitbringen / keine Partys...) Admission to The apartment is only permitted for registered persons, it is forbidden to bring more people or "frinds"...

name: Nice Room in the "Heart of Berlin" Kreuzberg
description: Hey guys, I rent a cozy lovley room in our big flat. I am living there with one more cool guy. We are pritty relaxed- and want u to make ur stay in Kreuzberg as nice as possible. Kreuzberg the "heart of Berlin", colourful and full of good energy. Supermarks, Bars, Coffes and Public transport is in front of the door. The room is calm and clean. If you need more information we help. Enjoy J
house_rules: Party and smoking just with our agreement

name: Designer Townhouse in central Berlin!
description: You will experience our own designer townhouse by staying in a quiet master bedroom with a king-size bed + one 1 40x70 children´s bed  with beautiful view to the terrace/garden with 1 children´s room that has a regular 90x200 adult matrass. You will have access to an open kitchen and living room. This very creative neighborhood in Prenzlauer Berg is crawling with wine bars, cafes & restaurants. It is walking distance to Alexanderplatz (15 min), Kollwitz (10 min) and right next to the city park. Designer Townhouse in the heart of Berlin You´ll stay in a quiet bedroom in the heart of Berlin which has a king-size bed with beautiful view/door to terrace and your very own luscious garden. Additionally, the master bedroom has 1 child’s bed (140x70 cm) and the children´s room has a bunk bed in the form of a house with a regular 90x200 cm adult matrass so the apartment is ideal for families with 1-2 young children). The apartment has three rooms (master bedroom, childrens room and living room)

name: Spacious, light filled room,excellent surroundings
description: Elegantly furnished private room, wooden flooring, on 3rd floor (with lift) in newly refurbished building. All basic amenities + dining table, chairs, couch-chair, etc... Room off main hallway and fully lockable.  Trendy area with lots of bars, restaurants & supermarkets in walking distance. • Free WIFI, TV, Blu-Ray/DVD player and hi-fi system • Brand new sofabed • All necessary bedding, bed linen and towels • Washing machine Excellent transport connnections to Tram, S-Bahn & U-Bahn Very spacious, light filled room with wooden flooring and a brand new sofabed. The room is ideally located off the main hallway, so no walkthrough and fully lockable. It features a dining table with several chairs, a comfy couch-chair, TV, Stereo, Blu-Ray / DVD Player and free WIFI. It also comes with all necessary bedding, bed linen and towels. • fully equipped kitchen: table and chairs, ample storage units, pots, pans, dishes, cutlery, glasses, kettle, coffee machine, toaster, microwave, dishwasher, fridg
